hint.bondActive: Bond Active! Will play for 6 Power (Total 12).
hint.bondInactive: Bond Unit: Base 2. Pairs boost to 6 each.
hint.spy: Spy: Goes to opponent (+10). Draw 2 cards.
hint.medic: Medic: Revive a non-Hero unit from discard.
hint.decoy: Decoy: Swap with a unit on board.

goal.title: Goal
goal.desc: Poker Tactics is based on Gwent. You have 10 cards to win 2 out of 3 rounds by having more power than your opponent.

core_mechanics.title: Core Mechanics
core_mechanics.resource: Resources: You only get 10 cards for the whole match. No drawing unless you use special cards.
core_mechanics.bluff: Bluffing: Knowing when to Pass (give up a round) to save strong cards is crucial.
core_mechanics.combo: Combos: Use Bond and Medic cards to maximize your score.

bond.name: Bond (2)
bond.desc: Base 2 power. If you have two 2s, they boost to 6 each (12 total).

soldier.name: Soldier (3-9)
soldier.desc: Power equals face value. No special ability.

spy.name: Spy (J)
spy.desc: Placed on OPPONENT'S board (+10 to them), but you draw 2 cards.

medic.name: Medic (Q)
medic.desc: Revive a non-Hero unit from your discard pile.

hero.name: Hero (K)
hero.desc: 15 Power. Immune to all effects (Scorch, Decoy, etc.).

scorch.name: Scorch (A)
scorch.desc: Destroy the strongest non-Hero unit(s) on the board.

decoy.name: Decoy (Joker)
decoy.desc: Swap with a non-Hero unit on your board to return it to hand.

setup.title: Setup
setup.desc: 10 cards dealt. You can swap up to 2 cards.

mulligan.title: Resource Lock
mulligan.desc: These 10 cards must last for 3 rounds. Conserve them wisely.

round.title: Rounds
round.play: Play: Turns alternate. Play one card per turn.
round.pass: Pass: If you don't want to play more cards, Pass. You pass for the rest of the round.
round.resolve: Resolve: When both pass, highest score wins the round.

winning.title: Winning
winning.desc: First to win 2 rounds wins the match.
